full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA YONGS RDZOGS KYI SROG SHING DU LHAG PAR GCES PA LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM GZHAG RNAM PAR 'BYED CING GSAL BAR BSHAD PA'I LAS 'BRAS GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @170B CES LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM BZHAG GSAL BOR STON PA GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIG GNAS LA SBYANGS PA MI DMAN PA MER GEN CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL LDAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA DANG, RANG GIS KYANG LAS 'BRAS LA YID CHES KYI NGES PA BSKYED PA'I PHYIR DANG, KHO BOS BRIS PA'I LAM RIM KHRID CHEN GYI LHAN THABS SU YANG 'GYUR RAM SNYAM DU BTZUN PA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MKHYEN RAB YANGS PA THO YON 'JAM DBYANGS DON GRUB BO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,, *, ,SVASTI, RGYAL BAS MDZAD GSUNG RAB MTHA' YAS KUN, ,SNYING PO'I GNAD BSDUS RAB @171A *, ,GSAL ME LONG DU, ,BAG CHAGS 'JOG PHYIR DANG PAS 'BRI SLO GA DANG, ,PAR DU BRKOS SOGS 'BREL BA BZHAG PA DGE ,'DI MTHUS DGE 'DUN 'DUS SDE'I KHRIMS GTZANG ZHING, ,BSTAN 'DZIN BLA MA'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA DANG, ,SBYIN BDAG GTZO BYAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN KUN, ,DON GNYIS MTHAR PHYIN SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG ,
